mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_exhibit ORDER BY exhib_cret_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT * FROM tb_exhibit WHERE 1=1
AND exhib_kind = ${kind}
AND exhib_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%')
AND exhib_detail_exp LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%')
AND exhib_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%')
AND exhib_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%') OR exhib_detail_exp LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%') OR exhib_location LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchTxt}, '%')

SELECT DISTINCT tmp.usr_seq, tmp.exhib_seq, tmp.exhib_title, tmp.file_dir_name, tmp.file_name FROM (SELECT C.usr_seq, A.exhib_seq, A.exhib_title, A.file_dir_name, A.file_name FROM tb_exhibit A LEFT JOIN tb_review B ON A.exhib_seq = B.exhib_seq LEFT JOIN tb_user C ON B.usr_seq = C.usr_seq WHERE C.usr_seq = #{usrSeq} ORDER BY B.rev_cret_date) AS tmp
